law.catch_line: Witnesses for relator may be granted immunity from prosecution.
law.text: The Commonwealth's attorney, county attorney or other attorney representing the relator may, with the approval of the court, grant immunity from prosecution to any witness who testifies for the relator.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3941m-9.
